headline: Novavax stock plunges after quarterly earnings, but company sees hope in licensing deals

headline: FDA clears Novavax to resume trials of Covid-19 and flu combo vaccine
summary: The FDA agreed for Novavax to continue trials of its vaccine combo after addressing a serious adverse event that paused trials.

headline: Moderna Tops BioSpace's Best Places to Work Ranking for Fourth Consecutive Year
summary: CAMBRIDGE, MA / ACCESSWIRE / November 12, 2024 / Moderna, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRNA) today announced it was ranked the number one large employer in BioSpace's 2025 Best Places to Work report based on the Company's reputation and commitment to innovation. ...

headline: Moderna: ranked among the 'Best Places to Work' by BioSpace
summary: Moderna has been ranked 1st in BioSpace's 'Best Places to Work 2025' ranking, thanks to its reputation and commitment to innovation. Stéphane Bancel, CEO of Moderna, expresses his pride at being...
